pageContext.claim: “I'll tell you there's a danger here. If someday a Democrat becomes president and you have a Republican House, they can impeach him for any reason. Or her. Any reason. We can't allow that to happen. We can't allow it to happen.”
pageContext.analysis: A Republican Congress has already impeached a Democratic president - twice. Both Andrew Johnson and Bill Clinton were Democrats who were impeached by GOP-led Congresses.
